00027 #include <linux/rbtree.h>
00028 #include <lustre_net.h>
00029 #include "nodemap_internal.h"
00030 
00039 struct lu_idmap *idmap_create(__u32 client_id, __u32 fs_id)
00040 {
00041         struct lu_idmap *idmap;
00042 
00043         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(idmap);
00044         if (idmap == NULL) {
00045                 CERROR("cannot allocate lu_idmap of size %zu bytes\n",
00046                        sizeof(idmap));
00047                 return NULL;
00048         }
00049 
00050         idmap->id_client = client_id;
00051         idmap->id_fs = fs_id;
00052         RB_CLEAR_NODE(&idmap->id_client_to_fs);
00053         RB_CLEAR_NODE(&idmap->id_fs_to_client);
00054         return idmap;
00055 }
00056 
00057 static void idmap_destroy(struct lu_idmap *idmap)
00058 
00059 {
00060         LASSERT(RB_EMPTY_NODE(&idmap->id_fs_to_client) == 0);
00061         LASSERT(RB_EMPTY_NODE(&idmap->id_client_to_fs) == 0);
00062         OBD_FREE_PTR(idmap);
00063 }
00064 
00078 void idmap_insert(enum nodemap_id_type id_type, struct lu_idmap *idmap,
00079                  struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00080 {
00081         struct lu_idmap         *cur = NULL;
00082         struct rb_node          *fwd_parent = NULL;
00083         struct rb_node          *bck_parent = NULL;
00084         struct rb_node          **fwd_node;
00085         struct rb_node          **bck_node;
00086         struct rb_root          *fwd_root;
00087         struct rb_root          *bck_root;
00088         bool                    replace = false;
00089 
00090         /* for purposes in idmap client to fs is forward
00091          * mapping, fs to client is backward mapping
00092          */
00093         if (id_type == NODEMAP_UID) {
00094                 fwd_root = &nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_uidmap;
00095                 bck_root = &nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_uidmap;
00096         } else {
00097                 fwd_root = &nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_gidmap;
00098                 bck_root = &nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_gidmap;
00099         }
00100 
00101         fwd_node = &fwd_root->rb_node;
00102         bck_node = &bck_root->rb_node;
00103 
00104         /* find fwd and bck idmap nodes before insertion or
00105          * replacing to prevent split brain idmaps
00106          */
00107         while (*fwd_node) {
00108                 fwd_parent = *fwd_node;
00109                 cur = rb_entry(*fwd_node, struct lu_idmap,
00110                                id_client_to_fs);
00111 
00112                 if (idmap->id_client < cur->id_client) {
00113                         fwd_node = &((*fwd_node)->rb_left);
00114                 } else if (idmap->id_client > cur->id_client) {
00115                         fwd_node = &((*fwd_node)->rb_right);
00116                 } else {
00117                         replace = true;
00118                         break;
00119                 }
00120         }
00121 
00122         if (!replace) {
00123                 while (*bck_node) {
00124                         bck_parent = *bck_node;
00125                         cur = rb_entry(*bck_node, struct lu_idmap,
00126                                        id_fs_to_client);
00127 
00128                         if (idmap->id_fs < cur->id_fs) {
00129                                 bck_node = &((*bck_node)->rb_left);
00130                         } else if (idmap->id_fs > cur->id_fs) {
00131                                 bck_node = &((*bck_node)->rb_right);
00132                         } else {
00133                                 replace = true;
00134                                 break;
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137         }
00138 
00139         if (!replace) {
00140                 rb_link_node(&idmap->id_client_to_fs, fwd_parent, fwd_node);
00141                 rb_insert_color(&idmap->id_client_to_fs, fwd_root);
00142                 rb_link_node(&idmap->id_fs_to_client, bck_parent, bck_node);
00143                 rb_insert_color(&idmap->id_fs_to_client, bck_root);
00144         } else {
00145                 rb_replace_node(&cur->id_client_to_fs,
00146                                 &idmap->id_client_to_fs,
00147                                 fwd_root);
00148                 rb_replace_node(&cur->id_fs_to_client,
00149                                 &idmap->id_fs_to_client,
00150                                 bck_root);
00151 
00152                 idmap_destroy(cur);
00153         }
00154 }
00155 
00164 void idmap_delete(enum nodemap_id_type id_type, struct lu_idmap *idmap,
00165                   struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00166 {
00167         struct rb_root  *fwd_root;
00168         struct rb_root  *bck_root;
00169 
00170         if (id_type == NODEMAP_UID) {
00171                 fwd_root = &nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_uidmap;
00172                 bck_root = &nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_uidmap;
00173         } else {
00174                 fwd_root = &nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_gidmap;
00175                 bck_root = &nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_gidmap;
00176         }
00177 
00178         rb_erase(&idmap->id_client_to_fs, fwd_root);
00179         rb_erase(&idmap->id_fs_to_client, bck_root);
00180 
00181         idmap_destroy(idmap);
00182 }
00183 
00196 struct lu_idmap *idmap_search(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap,
00197                               enum nodemap_tree_type tree_type,
00198                               enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00199                               const __u32 id)
00200 {
00201         struct rb_node  *node;
00202         struct rb_root  *root = NULL;
00203         struct lu_idmap *idmap;
00204 
00205         if (id_type == NODEMAP_UID && tree_type == NODEMAP_FS_TO_CLIENT)
00206                 root = &nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_uidmap;
00207         else if (id_type == NODEMAP_UID && tree_type == NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS)
00208                 root = &nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_uidmap;
00209         else if (id_type == NODEMAP_GID && tree_type == NODEMAP_FS_TO_CLIENT)
00210                 root = &nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_gidmap;
00211         else if (id_type == NODEMAP_GID && tree_type == NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS)
00212                 root = &nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_gidmap;
00213 
00214         node = root->rb_node;
00215 
00216         if (tree_type == NODEMAP_FS_TO_CLIENT) {
00217                 while (node) {
00218                         idmap = rb_entry(node, struct lu_idmap,
00219                                          id_fs_to_client);
00220                         if (id < idmap->id_fs)
00221                                 node = node->rb_left;
00222                         else if (id > idmap->id_fs)
00223                                 node = node->rb_right;
00224                         else
00225                                 return idmap;
00226                 }
00227         } else {
00228                 while (node) {
00229                         idmap = rb_entry(node, struct lu_idmap,
00230                                          id_client_to_fs);
00231                         if (id < idmap->id_client)
00232                                 node = node->rb_left;
00233                         else if (id > idmap->id_client)
00234                                 node = node->rb_right;
00235                         else
00236                                 return idmap;
00237                 }
00238         }
00239 
00240         return NULL;
00241 }
00242 
00243 /*
00244  * delete all idmap trees from a nodemap
00245  *
00246  * \param       nodemap         nodemap to delete trees from
00247  *
00248  * This uses the postorder safe traversal code that is committed
00249  * in a later kernel. Each lu_idmap strucuture is destroyed.
00250  */
00251 void idmap_delete_tree(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00252 {
00253         struct lu_idmap         *idmap;
00254         struct lu_idmap         *temp;
00255         struct rb_root          root;
00256 
00257         root = nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_uidmap;
00258         nm_rbtree_postorder_for_each_entry_safe(idmap, temp, &root,
00259                                                 id_fs_to_client) {
00260                 idmap_destroy(idmap);
00261         }
00262 
00263         root = nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_gidmap;
00264         nm_rbtree_postorder_for_each_entry_safe(idmap, temp, &root,
00265                                                 id_client_to_fs) {
00266                 idmap_destroy(idmap);
00267         }
00268 }
